experiences.description: Led the development of a Moroccan alternative to OpenRouter, focusing on Arabic/Moroccan use cases, data sovereignty, and developer-friendly APIs
responsibilities: Directed the design and implementation of the LLM API gateway with FastAPI for model serving, API key validation, and intelligent LLM routing
Supervised the integration of secure authentication and authorization (user login/registration, API key management) with the dashboard UI
Coordinated frontend and backend development using Next.js, Tailwind, and Shadcn for dashboard, playground, and chat interface
Oversaw containerization of LLMs with Docker/Ollama for scalable deployment and reproducibility
Guided the integration of lightweight LLMs (Mistral, LLaMA, DeepSeek, Gemini) and preparation of SDKs for Python/JS developers

experiences.description: Developed an AI-driven multi-agent system for SSIS-to-Databricks migration, enabling organizations to modernize ETL processes faster while reducing manual effort and operational risks.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a Multi-Layered Analysis Pipeline to parse raw SSIS files, validate data types, and extract complex transformations, providing actionable insights and improving migration accuracy

Built and coordinated a Migration Agentic System using CrewAI (Manager, Analyst, Planner, Coder, Validator, RAG) to automatically generate production-ready Databricks notebooks and comprehensive migration reports
Enhanced transparency and decision-making through coordinated multi-agent workflows
Oversaw end-to-end workflow automation, delivering a fault-tolerant, step-by-step migration solution that accelerated project timelines and optimized resource utilization
